problem.markdown: Examples of anaerobic endurance training are: interval running, fast continuous runs, speed and agility drills, grass and guerrilla drills, individual movement techniques, combatives, and negotiating obstacles. (x) True ( ) False
problem.p: Examples of anaerobic endurance training are: interval running, fast continuous runs, speed and agility drills, grass and guerrilla drills, individual movement techniques, combatives, and negotiating obstacles.
